name: Megalith Bethor
desc: You can Ritual Summon this card with any "Megalith" card. When this card is Ritual Summoned: You can target cards your opponent controls, up to the number of Ritual Monsters in your GY; destroy them. You can discard this card; Ritual Summon 1 "Megalith" Ritual Monster from your hand. You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels equal the monster's Level or more. You can only use each effect of "Megalith Bethor" once per turn.
